# Interface: IKeyPair

Definition of signature key pair.

## Table of contents

### Properties

- [publicKey](IKeyPair.md#publickey)
- [privateKey](IKeyPair.md#privatekey)

## Properties

### publicKey

• **publicKey**: `Uint8Array`

The public key.

---

### privateKey

• **privateKey**: `Uint8Array`

The private key.
